# Live Tool Drive Shim Check


## 1

Remove all driven tools from the turret.

Install the T-0080 alignment block on tool #1
and T-0082 indicator base tool on the LT drive
shaft.

Check the alignment in the Z axis.

If the indicator reading exceeds .002" then
shims [1] will need to be added or removed.

If the alignment in Z is correct proceed to the
BMT Live Tooling Drive Alignment section.
